author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tamilnad Mercantile Bank’s Valliyoor branch has been shifted to a refurbished premises in STN Building on the main road.

Managing Director of Shalom Garments P. Gnanaraj inaugurated TMB’s new office premises and Vasantha Selvanayagam, correspondent of Keins Matriculation Higher Secondary School lighted the traditional lamp. Chairman of Valliyoor Town Panchayat T.T. Lawrence inaugurated the locker room and T. Vincent Devaraj, proprietor of STN Bricks inaugurated the opening of new lockers.

Tamil Nadu Government Cable Service’s Tirunelveli district in-charge V. Nambi inaugurated the ATM services and Rev. Fr. J. Arul Sahayam, director, Valliyoor Multipurpose Social Service Society inaugurated the IT services of TMB.
title: TMB’s Valliyoor branch gets a refurbished premises
